title: Bi-Weekly Movies, TV Shows, Documentaries & Podcasts Discussion Thread
selftext:
So, what is r/India watching of late?

Watched any premieres yesterday? Loved any movie that you saw recently and are dying to discuss it? Discovered any new series lately? Well, this is your space. Go crazy!

This is not just limited to Hollywood/Bollywood, nor to any particular language.

Feel free to share short films, or podcasts of your choice, too, and ask for recommendations for what to watch!

**Movies and Shows Thread is posted every two weeks on Saturday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Movies+thread+discussion+&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/e3cqi5nuw8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=c6623226acf7856bb5a61313af7bec382c8525f1
comments: 'Monster' Anime. Unlike other anime which are set mostly in fantasy or sci fi world, this one is grounded in reality. Really great so far.
This is such a good anime. Its slow paced but one of my favorite animes. Such great character building and life in East Germany beautifully portrayed. Also cinematography is just awesome.
Watching Defending Jacob with a 3 month free subscription of Apple TV+. Pretty decent so far

Appan 

Malayalam movie released on Sony LIV. 

A family drama elevated by superb performances. 

There is no such thing called bad people getting better in the end.

Felt like watching the struggles of a family with own eyes, that's what makes cinematography best rather than cinematic shots.

You won't regret watching this movie.

Just gone through dubbed versions of movie, it's better to watch the movie in Malayalam with English subtitles.
Watched super deluxe it's soo good..Really liked altered carbon season 1 rewatching it also.

Watching IWTV. So good. 

Also, watched School of Good and Evil. It is very ridiculous, but good enough fun.

Watching BETTER CALL SAUL!! What a series , Awesome dialogue delivery by BOB ODENKIRK.. 
I agree they should have  wrap the whole in 4 seasons but still I never feel bored watching it.
Watching Mob Psycho III and Chainsaw Man. Also House of the Dragon but got some catching up to do there. Planning to watch the new season on Indian Predator on Netflix.
Been wanting to watch this for so long. Will get to it someday
There is a Paki movie "Legend of Maula Jatt" which has recently released and became the highest ever grossing movie there (starring Fawad Khan of Kapoor & sons). Any chance it will come in India?

About to finish season 1 of The Sopranos . Liking it so far.

Need something to watch. 

I have watched recently: Primal, Cobra Kai, Banshee, The Boys, GoT and HoTD S1, all MCU Shows except for She Hulk. All mcu netflix shows except for Jessica Jones s2 s3 and the punisher s2.
He did good considering his previous acting ventures.
man, ,i still remember the magical times when i first watched sopranos. you are in for a treat.
Its like godfather but every episode is godfather and comedy
